item.title: Blocked gulley, road flooded, 13th January
item.description:
Despite logging this previously, the Council deem it is now fixed and the complaint closed? Absolutely shocking, when the road has been flooded now for nearly 2 days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 50 Parton Road. 3ft by 1ft approx. I have been hit by flying stones!, 13th January
item.description:
I have had to sweep to kerb large stones as they regularly fly in the air and it is near school pedestrian run. It has been so called repaired on more than one occasion.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelcroft, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
